title: small title font with curvy R leg
content:
I'm looking for the font used for "bourbon peaches" , "fruits & veggies", etc. Looks like Gotham, but with slight flourishes. Help please? Thanks!

Font: 

 Quicksand 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133816/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133816/http:/typophile.com/files/image_91.jpg) | 124.38 KB |
author: tiptopolive

comments.content: It looks like **[Quicksand (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133816/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Quicksand%20-%20Bold&fid=a1d3f9c43a9bb11db235cb6e8be77f4f&fsize=60&text=BOURBON%20PEACHES%20FRUITS%20%26%20VEGGIES&wrap=2)** by Andrew Paglinawan (2011), now part of Google Web Fonts
